title: Towards the cost-effective design of stormwater infiltration trenches: a hybrid model integrating cost–benefit analysis and an analytical stochastic approach
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00963G, Paper
Jun Wang, Yijiao Diao, Shengle Cao, Jiachang Wang, Jingjing Jia, Yiping Guo
This study proposes a hybrid analytical model integrating two cost–benefit analysis approaches and an analytical stochastic approach for the proper design of infiltration trenches.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
